ModMetaData.name: Misc. Robots Expansion
ModMetaData.author: Sixdd
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds more robots to buy from traders and build yourself!:
- ChefBot A drone to help your chefs cooking - FarmerBot A robot to help your farmers in the fields - MinerBot A robot to take the place of your miners - FireBot A robot to help fight fires - DoctorBot A robot to take the place of your doctors - BuilderBot A robot to take the place of your builders - CrafterBot A complex robot to take on crafting, starts at lower skill level but is capable of learning
Mod Version: 0.17.0.1
